pullRequest.title: Fix incorrectly ported patch for restoreBlurMipmap
pullRequest.bodyText:
In past versions, there was setBlurMipmapDirect, setBlurMipmap, and restoreBlurMipmap. The first did the GL change directly while the latter two allowed you to "remember" the prior setting and restore it.
restoreBlurMipmap disappeared in 1.15 and a patch was added to bring it back, except it didn't bring back the last variables accompanying it, it would just call setBlurMipmapDirect with the current state variables, which just does nothing.
Fix the patch to match older versions and update the one call to restoreBlurMipmap to use the right setup call.

commit.message: Fix incorrectly ported patch for restoreBlurMipmap

nodes.bodyText: I guess these should be either private or protected, but not package-private, or am I missing something?
